page.title: 09SOCIAL ORGANISATIONS
page.content: Gawsworth Social Organisations. Girls' Brigade continued. Mrs. Longson and lieutenant is Mrs. Higgins. The Scouts, by Anthony Davenport. The Scouts; Scouts are one stage up from cubs.You can join when you are about 11 yrs old.The two people in charge of scouts are Mike Goddard and Alex Price.Scouts is held on a Friday night 7pm-9pm.We have groups,just like cubs called Patrols.These are Cobra,Hawk and Wolf.At scouts we play games,work for badges and also do various activities like night-hikes and canoeing.The people in charge of the patrols are called Patrol Leaders (P.L's) and Assistant Patrol Leaders (A.P.L's).When you finish you more up into Venture scouts.
